attributes.action: Ban the use of bright headlights on cars.
attributes.background: An RAC survey found that drivers are being temporarily blinded.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We are not sure what you mean by "bright headlights" or what cars this ban would apply to.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to set a maximum brightness for headlights on new cars if that is something you would like to see happen.
